term.title: sydnone imines

item.text: Imines of sydnones (i.e. having an imino group in place of the exocyclic oxygen atom). [image: Not defined] (These structures represent only two canonical forms.)

sources.item: PAC, 1995, 67, 1307. 'Glossary of class names of organic compounds and reactivity intermediates based on structure (IUPAC Recommendations 1995)' on page 1371 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199567081307)

term.citation: Citation: 'sydnone imines' in IUPAC Compendium of Chemical Terminology, 5th ed. International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry; 2025. Online version 5.0.0, 2025. 10.1351/goldbook.S06206
